name: IDYIA Innovations
overview: IDYIA Innovations, Inc. through its subsidiary, IDYIA, Inc., provides customized managed hosting, consulting, and data processing services to corporations and mid-market companies in North America. The company specializes in managing applications and networks in Linux environment. Its hosting services include co-location, disaster recovery, virtual, voice-over-Internet protocol, and data storage services. The companyâ€™s hosting services also comprise managed services that are customized to the needs of clients, ranging from basic monitoring to various managed services, including architecting expansion and migration, custom monitoring, application and data management, intrusion detection, and …

funding_rounds.source_description: IDYIA Innovations Inc. has completed a $267,500 debenture financing
